subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: LeBron James won his personal matchup with Kobe Bryant in a duel of the N.B.A.’s leading scorers Sunday, tallying 14 of his 41 points in the fourth quarter.
snippet: LeBron James won his personal matchup with Kobe Bryant in a duel of the N.B.A.’s leading scorers Sunday, tallying 14 of his 41 points in the fourth quarter.
